meanings.definition: A plural form of scyphus, a type of ancient Greek drinking cup.
meanings.sent1: During the archaeological dig, they found several scyphi buried in the ancient ruins.
meanings.sent2: The museum displayed a collection of scyphi used by the Greeks for drinking wine.
meanings.sent3: The archaeologist accidentally knocked over a stack of scyphi, creating a loud clatter.
meanings.sent4: The scyphi gleamed in the sunlight, reflecting the rich history of the Greek civilization.
meanings.sent5: The intricate designs on the scyphi depicted scenes from Greek mythology.
